inputs.input: I'd like a 2-chapter video of 3 minutes of 450 words on 'AI Won't Take Your Jobs. Those Who Use AI Will!', please!
inputs.instructions: Evaluate if the script follows the request: check if the proposed structure (chapitrage), story perspective (angle), length, and duration align with expectations. Ensure coherence, engagement, and relevance for a YouTube audience on AI. No off-topic content.
